item.description:
Official Website - www.InToWin2012.com
Planning & Promotion - www.InToWin2012.com/Planning

On April 15th, we plan to raise $2 million for Ron Paul's campaign, but we can ONLY achieve this if we can get 20,000 people to attend this Facebook event!

https://www.facebook.com/events/384814491548793/

Attend this event and invite all your friends!

What is a Money Bomb? - The "In It To Win It" Money Bomb is a 24 hour "Online" fundraising event. On Apr 15th, all donations are to be made to the official campaign website at www.RonPaul2012.com
item.name: In It To Win Moneybomb
